title: Use Log Rules
speech: Logarithm multiplication rule:  the log base a of b, plus the log base a of c is equal to the log base a of b c, , so  the log base 2 of x plus the log base 2 of, parentheses x minus 6,  is equal to the log base 2 of parentheses, x, parentheses x minus 6,

title: Matching bases
text: Both $$\log_{2}\left(16\right)$$ and $$\log_{2}\left(x \left(x-6\right)\right)$$ containing same log base, the log can be removed, so it becomes $$x \left(x-6\right)=16$$.
speech: Both  the log base 2 of 16,  and  the log base 2 of parentheses, x, parentheses x minus 6,    containing same log base, the log can be removed, so it becomes , x, parentheses x minus 6,  is equal to 16 .
pacedSpeech: and   the log base 2 of , x,  x minus 6,
containing same log base, the log can be removed, so it becomes  , x,  x minus 6,  is equal to 16

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: Given $$x \left(x-6\right)=16$$ solve for $$x$$. We can simplify it as $$x^2-6x-16=0$$. Then we can factor the quadratic and get $$\left(x-8\right) \left(x+2\right)=0$$ which gives $$x=8$$ or $$x=-2$$. Given $$\log_{a}\left(b\right)$$, $$b$$ can not be negative. We can omit the negative answer. Therefore $$x=8$$ is the only solution for this equation.
speech: Given  x, parentheses x minus 6,  is equal to 16  solve for  x . We can simplify it as  x squared minus 6 x minus 16 is equal to 0 . Then we can factor the quadratic and get  parentheses x minus 8,  times, parentheses x plus 2,  is equal to 0  which gives  x, is equal to 8  or  x, is equal to negative 2 . Given  the log base a of b, ,  b  can not be negative. We can omit the negative answer. Therefore  x is equal to 8  is the only solution for this equation.
